page.title: 14DEVELOPMENT OF AMPNEY CRUCIS
page.content: The subject which causes most controversy in our block is building and land development. Most people are against further housing in the area because they fear that{Ampney Crucis } could become a part of{Cirencester.} There are always furious letters of objection to any house building applications, especially in the Conservation areas. There was an appeal to the Secretary of State against the District Council's refusal to allow houses to be built at Dudley Corner. The builders won and the houses have been built but any future developer must be prepared for a fight. Residents are determined to preserve the linear character of the village and to object to any development on the football pitch or farmland down to the A 417.
